name: Scuba Spearfishing - Paradise Deep Diving Game
name_original: Scuba Spearfishing - Paradise Deep Diving Game
description:
Get your spear gun! Get your scuba gear! Let’s go diving! But not just diving. Let’s go spearfishing!

Deep within the ocean lurk sharks, electric eels, and harmful squid. You are far from the surface and your only protection is a spear gun. Are you ready? Can you stay safe? Beware of sharks and squid. Use your spears to protect yourself. Collect golden coins and starfish to unlock new diving characters.

EXCITING FUN!!!

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Scuba Spearfishing’ Now!!!

PLEASE NOTE: This game is free to play but does charge real money for additional content. You may adjust your settings to lock out this function.
